scripts.dist: electron-builder && powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'Portable'; Copy-Item 'dist/*.exe' -Destination 'Portable' -Force; if (Test-Path 'apps') { Copy-Item 'apps' -Destination 'Portable' -Recurse -Force }; if (Test-Path 'assets') { Copy-Item 'assets' -Destination 'Portable' -Recurse -Force }; Write-Host 'Portable build completed successfully'"
